RELIGION

8 a.m.

GENERAL

Sri Krishna College of Technology: One-day workshop on ‘Geometric Dimensioning & Tolerancing (GD&T) Stackup Analysis’, ES Seminar Hall, college premises, 9.30 a.m.

NGP College of Arts and Science: Placement Training Program on Abacus and Vedic Math, conference hall, college premises,

10 a.m.

Sri Krishna College of Arts and Science: Guest Lecture on ‘Nanobiotechnology: A Bigger Fish for Fry’, SKIM Hall, campus premises, 10 a.m.

Srinivasa Vidhyalaya Matriculation Higher Secondary School: Annual Sports Day, school premises, 2.30 p.m.

Kalaignar Karunanidhi Institute of Technology: Three-day Entrepreneurship Awareness Camp, KIT Campus, Kannampalayam Post, 9 a.m.

The Coimbatore Productivity Council: Quality Circles, Coimbatore Productivity Council, Race Course, 9.30 a.m.

P.S.G Trust: Discourse on PSG Vanavil, PSG College of Techonology, campus premises. 5.20 p.m.

Akila Bharatha Mootha Kudimakkal Matrum Pensionargal Kootamaippu (ANMKPK Bharat): Pensioners’ day, Saraswathi Natarajan Kalyana Mandapam, Ramanathapuram, 10 a.m.

Bishop Appasamy College of Arts and Science: Eye screening camp, college premises, 9.30 a.m.

CMS College of Science and Commerce: Pongal celebration, college premises,

9.30 a.m.

Mnemonics Learning Centre: Study Skill for students- free program, Mnemonics Learning Centre, R.S. Puram, 10 a.m.

Avinashilingam Institute For Home Sciences and Higher Education for Women: Sadguru Tyagabrahma Aradhana, Thiruchitrambalam Auditiorium, college premises, 10.30 a.m.

Sri Ramakrishna College of Engineering: Swacch Bhaarat: - Cleaning of School Campus and Socio-economic survey, 24, Veerapaandi, Marundhangarai, 10 a.m.

Sri Ranganathar Institute of Engineering and Technology: Technical function and Project expo, college premises, 9.30 a.m.

GRG School of Management Studies: Management Development Programme, Institute campus, 9.30 a.m.

AJK College of Arts and Science: Seminar on Capital Market Reforms, Grace Auditorium, college premises, 10 a.m.

Centre for Career in Uniformed Services: Nethaji Subash Chandra Bose 119{+t}{+h} birth anniversary celebrations, St. Michael’s Higher Secondary School, 10 a.m.
title: Coimbatore today
